definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: My small business operates on a razor-thin profit margin.
sentences.chinese: 我的生意属小本经营，利润微薄。

sentences.english: XiaoMin cannot go back to the home for my parents with small-business hua.
sentences.chinese: 小敏无法回到了老家华欣帮父母打理小本生意。

sentences.english: Mr.Smith began in a small way and piked along.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生开始小本经营而后发迹。

sentences.english: Shops doing Business with a small capital can also make great deals.
sentences.chinese: 小本经营的商家，也能做成大生意。

sentences.english: Several days later, these two friends are going to go to different winter camps.
sentences.chinese: 几天后，琪琪和小本被送去了不同的冬令营。

sentences.english: He was a shopkeeper in a small way.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小本经营的店主。

sentences.english: Jack is in a small way of auctioneering.
Running a small business is anything but easy.
sentences.chinese: 经营小本生意绝非易事。

sentences.english: Ben and Kiki start a snow ball fight.
sentences.chinese: 琪琪和小本打起了雪仗。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, Ben and Kiki finish their camps and come back home.
sentences.chinese: 半个月后，冬令营结束，小本和琪琪回到了家。

sentences.english: We were living on a shoestring.
We still had to operate on a shoestring.
This couple ran a restaurant on a shoestring.
sentences.chinese: 你对夫妇小本经营了个饭店。

sentences.english: But, to run a small business is by no means an easy job.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经营小本生意绝非易事。

sentences.english: Little Ben goes to Drawing Camp.
sentences.chinese: 小本被送去参加一个绘画冬令营。

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
the "Little Red Book" of selected writings of Mao Zedong (refers to 毛主席語錄|毛主席语录[Mao2 Zhu3 xi2 Yu3 lu4])
